umask 002

section.title: chown - change file owner and group
section.para: chown - change file owner and group
section.screen: [root@test ~]# touch test [root@test ~]# adduser neo [root@test ~]# chown neo test [root@test ~]# ll test -rw-r--r-- 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test

section.title: chgrp - change group ownership
section.screen:
# chgrp daemon -R *
# ll drwxrwxr-x 3 neo daemon 4096 Apr 16 18:23 user

section.title: chmod - change file access permissions
section.screen:
u = user g = group o = other a = all
r = 4 w = 2 x = 1

[root@test ~]# ll test -rwxr--r-- 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test [root@test ~]# chmod g=x test [root@test ~]# ll test -rwx--xr-- 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test [root@test ~]# chmod go+w test [root@test ~]# ll test -rwx-wxrw- 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test [root@test ~]# chmod u-wx test [root@test ~]# ll test -r---wxrw- 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test [root@test ~]# chmod u=rwx test [root@test ~]# ll test -rwx-wxrw- 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test [root@test ~]# chmod a=rwx test [root@test ~]# ll test -rwxrwxrwx 1 neo root 0 Apr 19 18:15 test

[root@development ~]# chattr -i /etc/passwd [root@development ~]# lsattr /etc/passwd ------------- /etc/passwd

section.title: NOPASSWD
section.para: ubuntu NOPASSWD sudo的时候不需要输入密码
section.screen: %admin ALL=(ALL)ALL 改为 %admin ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: NOPASSWD: ALL
www localhost=NOPASSWD: /bin/cat, /bin/ls

section.screen: neo ALL = （root） /bin/mount, /bin/umount, !/bin/mount /data0 dba ALL = /bin/mount /u0[1-5], /bin/umount /u0[1-5]

section.screen: ## Allow root to run any commands anywhere root ALL=(ALL) ALL neo ALL=(ALL) ALL %wheel ALL=(ALL) ALL

section.title: ACL - Access Control List
section.screen: $ sudo modprobe loop $ dd if=/dev/zero of=file bs=1k count=100 $ sudo losetup /dev/loop0 file $ sudo mkfs.ext3 /dev/loop0 $ sudo mkdir /mnt/loop $ sudo mount -o rw,acl /dev/loop0 /mnt/loop/ $ sudo chown neo.neo -R /mnt/loop $ cd /mnt/loop/

section.title: getfacl - get file access control lists
section.screen: $ touch file $ ls -l file -rw-r--r-- 1 neo neo 0 2008-12-22 15:28 file
$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- group::r-- other::r--
section.para: display the default access control list only
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl dir # file: dir # owner: neo # group: neo user::rwx group::r-x other::r-x default:user::rwx default:user:svnroot:rw- default:group::r-x default:group:nagios:rw- default:mask::rwx default:other::r-x
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl -d dir # file: dir # owner: neo # group: neo user::rwx user:svnroot:rw- group::r-x group:nagios:rw- mask::rwx other::r-x

$ getfacl -R dir # file: dir # owner: neo # group: neo user::rwx group::r-x other::r-x default:user::rwx default:user:svnroot:rw- default:group::r-x default:group:nagios:rw- default:mask::rwx default:other::r-x
# file: dir/file1 # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:svnroot:rw- group::r-x #effective:r-- group:nagios:rw- mask::rw- other::r--

section.title: setfacl - set file access control lists
set
section.para: add a user svnroot to file
section.screen: neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -m u:svnroot:rw file
section.para: if you can see a '+' at last, it's successed
section.screen: $ ls -l file -rw-rw-r--+ 1 neo neo 0 2008-12-22 15:44 file
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:svnroot:rw- group::r-- mask::rw- other::r--
section.para: add a user cvsroot to file again
section.screen: neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -m u:cvsroot:rw file neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:cvsroot:rw- user:svnroot:rw- group::r-- mask::rw- other::r--
section.para: add a user and group for that
section.screen: neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -m u:gnump3d:rwx,g:nagios:r file neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:gnump3d:rwx user:cvsroot:rw- user:svnroot:rw- group::r-- group:nagios:r-- mask::rwx other::r--
section.para: modify the current ACL(s) of file(s)
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:svnroot:rw- group::r-- mask::rw- other::r--
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -m u:svnroot:r-x file neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:svnroot:r-x group::r-- mask::r-x other::r--

section.title: default
section.screen:
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -d -m u:svnroot:rw dir/ neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl dir/ # file: dir # owner: neo # group: neo user::rwx group::r-x other::r-x default:user::rwx default:user:svnroot:rw- default:group::r-x default:mask::rwx default:other::r-x
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -d -m g:nagios:rw dir/ neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl dir/ # file: dir # owner: neo # group: neo user::rwx group::r-x other::r-x default:user::rwx default:user:svnroot:rw- default:group::r-x default:group:nagios:rw- default:mask::rwx default:other::r-x
section.para: the file1 will inherit acl by default.
section.screen: neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ touch dir/file1 neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl dir/file1 # file: dir/file1 # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:svnroot:rw- group::r-x #effective:r-- group:nagios:rw- mask::rw- other::r--

section.title: remove
section.para: remove entries from the ACL(s) of file(s)
section.screen: neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -x u:cvsroot file neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -x g:nagios file neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- user:gnump3d:rwx user:svnroot:rw- group::r-- mask::rwx other::r--
neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ setfacl -b file neo@netkiller:/mnt/loop$ getfacl file # file: file # owner: neo # group: neo user::rw- group::r-- other::r--

section.title: backup and restore
section.screen: $ getfacl -R dir > dir.acl
$ setfacl --restore dir.acl
